mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed_info (feed_title, feed_content, feed_file, hash_tag, user_id) VALUES (#{feed_title}, #{feed_content}, #{feed_file}, #{hash_tag}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT f.feed_title, f.feed_content, f.feed_file, f.hash_tag, f.user_id, f.feed_idx, u.user_nick, u.user_profile FROM feed_info f LEFT JOIN user_info u ON f.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY f.feed_idx DESC
